Package com.refinedmods.refinedstorage.api.autocrafting.task

Interface ICraftingTask

All Known Implementing Classes:
CraftingTask
public interface ICraftingTask
Represents a crafting task.

  • Method Details

    • update

      boolean update()
      Updates this task.
      Returns:
      true if this crafting task is finished, false otherwise

    • onCancelled

      void onCancelled()
      Called when this task is cancelled.

    • getQuantity

      int getQuantity()
      Returns:
      the amount of items that have to be crafted

    • getCompletionPercentage

      int getCompletionPercentage()
      Returns:
      the completion percentage

    • getRequested

      ICraftingRequestInfo getRequested()
      Returns:
      the stack requested

    • onTrackedInsert

      int onTrackedInsert(net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack stack, int size)
      Called when a stack is inserted into the system through INetwork.insertItemTracked(ItemStack, int).
      Parameters:
      stack - the stack
      Returns:
      the remainder of this stack after processing of the task

    • onTrackedInsert

      int onTrackedInsert(net.neoforged.neoforge.fluids.FluidStack stack, int size)
      Called when a stack is inserted into the system through INetwork.insertFluidTracked(FluidStack, int).
      Parameters:
      stack - the stack
      Returns:
      the remainder of this stack after processing of the task

    • writeToNbt

      net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundTag writeToNbt(net.minecraft.nbt.CompoundTag tag)
      Writes this task to NBT.
      Parameters:
      tag - the tag
      Returns:
      the written tag

    • getCraftingMonitorElements

      List<ICraftingMonitorElement> getCraftingMonitorElements()
      Returns:
      the elements of this task for display in the crafting monitor

    • getPattern

      ICraftingPattern getPattern()
      Returns:
      the crafting pattern corresponding to this task

    • getStartTime

      long getStartTime()
      Returns:
      the unix time in ms when this task has started

    • getId

      UUID getId()
      Returns:
      the id of this task

    • start

      void start()
      Start the CraftingTask
